title: Pirate Queen: A Reverse Harem Romance
description: Three dashing pirates. One not-so-proper lady. A sexy reverse harem romance on the high seas you won’t want to put down!  Charlotte’s life has never been her own. After her father ships her off to the Caribbean to marry a horrid old Baron against her will, she’ll do just about anything to escape. But when her ship is attacked by Captain Blackheart’s infamous pirate crew, she fears she’s headed for an even worse fate.  Once taken captive, Charlotte discovers the roguish Captain and his two handsome officers are nothing like the stories she’s heard. They offer her something no one else ever has: freedom.  But freedom comes with a price—a thrilling, seductive proposal like nothing Charlotte's ever known. A price she’s not sure she’s willing to pay, no matter how tempting all three men are…  *This is a short & sexy reverse harem historical romance with a dash of menage/mfmm featuring three wicked pirates and one lucky lady. Enjoy!
author: Liza Heat
